name: @dotenc/cli
description: üîê Git-native encrypted environments powered by your SSH keys
author: Ivan Filho <i@ivanfilho.com>

scripts.build: bun build src/cli.ts --outdir dist --target node --packages external && { echo '#!/usr/bin/env node'; cat dist/cli.js; } > dist/cli.tmp && mv dist/cli.tmp dist/cli.js
scripts.build:binary: bun run build:binary:darwin-arm64 && bun run build:binary:darwin-x64 && bun run build:binary:linux-x64 && bun run build:binary:linux-arm64 && bun run build:binary:windows-x64
scripts.test:e2e: docker build -t dotenc-e2e -f e2e/Dockerfile .. && docker run --rm dotenc-e2e
scripts.test:e2e:coverage: rm -rf coverage-e2e && mkdir -p coverage-e2e && docker build -t dotenc-e2e -f e2e/Dockerfile .. && docker build -t dotenc-e2e-coverage -f e2e/Dockerfile.coverage .. && docker run --rm -v "$(pwd)/coverage-e2e:/cov" dotenc-e2e-coverage
